memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble x1, wxDouble y1, wxDouble x2, wxDouble y2, const wxColour &c1, const wxColour &c2) const
memberdef.name: CreateLinearGradientBrush

briefdescription.para: Creates a native brush with a linear gradient.

detaileddescription.para: The brush starts at (x1, y1) and ends at (x2, y2). Either just the start and end gradient colours (c1 and c2) or full set of gradient stops can be specified.
The version taking wxGraphicsGradientStops is new in wxWidgets 2.9.1.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble x1, wxDouble y1, wxDouble x2, wxDouble y2, const wxGraphicsGradientStops &stops) const
memberdef.name: CreateLinearGradientBrush

briefdescription.para: Creates a native brush with a linear gradient.

detaileddescription.para: The brush starts at (x1, y1) and ends at (x2, y2). Either just the start and end gradient colours (c1 and c2) or full set of gradient stops can be specified.
The version taking wxGraphicsGradientStops is new in wxWidgets 2.9.1.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble xo, wxDouble yo, wxDouble xc, wxDouble yc, wxDouble radius, const wxColour &oColor, const wxColour &cColor) const
memberdef.name: CreateRadialGradientBrush

briefdescription.para: Creates a native brush with a radial gradient.

detaileddescription.para: The brush originates at (xo, yc) and ends on a circle around (xc, yc) with the given radius.
The gradient may be specified either by its start and end colours oColor and cColor or by a full set of gradient stops.
The version taking wxGraphicsGradientStops is new in wxWidgets 2.9.1.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble xo, wxDouble yo, wxDouble xc, wxDouble yc, wxDouble radius, const wxGraphicsGradientStops &stops)=0
memberdef.name: CreateRadialGradientBrush

briefdescription.para: Creates a native brush with a radial gradient.

detaileddescription.para: The brush originates at (xo, yc) and ends on a circle around (xc, yc) with the given radius.
The gradient may be specified either by its start and end colours oColor and cColor or by a full set of gradient stops.
The version taking wxGraphicsGradientStops is new in wxWidgets 2.9.1.

memberdef.argsstring: (const wxGraphicsBitmap &bmp, wxDouble x, wxDouble y, wxDouble w, wxDouble h)=0
memberdef.name: DrawBitmap

briefdescription.para: Draws the bitmap.

detaileddescription.para: In case of a mono bitmap, this is treated as a mask and the current brushed is used for filling.

memberdef.argsstring: (const wxBitmap &bmp, wxDouble x, wxDouble y, wxDouble w, wxDouble h)=0
memberdef.name: DrawBitmap

briefdescription.para: Draws the bitmap.

detaileddescription.para: In case of a mono bitmap, this is treated as a mask and the current brushed is used for filling.

briefdescription.para: Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a wxWindow.
Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a wxWindowDC.
Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a wxMemoryDC.
Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a wxPrinterDC.

detaileddescription.para: Under GTK+, this will only work when using the GtkPrint printing backend which is available since GTK+ 2.10.

briefdescription.para: Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a wxEnhMetaFileDC.

detaileddescription.para: This function, as wxEnhMetaFileDC class itself, is only available only under MSW.

briefdescription.para: Creates a wxGraphicsContext associated with a wxImage.

detaileddescription.para: The image specifies the size of the context as well as whether alpha is supported (if wxImage::HasAlpha()) or not and the initial contents of the context. The image object must have a life time greater than that of the new context as the context copies its contents back to the image when it is destroyed.

briefdescription.para: Create a lightweight context that can be used only for measuring text.
Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a native context.

detaileddescription.para: This native context must be a CGContextRef for Core Graphics, a Graphics pointer for GDIPlus, or a cairo_t pointer for cairo.

briefdescription.para: Creates a wxGraphicsContext from a native window.
Clips drawings to the specified region.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble x, wxDouble y, wxDouble w, wxDouble h)=0
memberdef.name: Clip

briefdescription.para: Clips drawings to the specified rectangle.
Concatenates the passed in transform with the current transform of this context.
Creates wxGraphicsBitmap from an existing wxBitmap.

detaileddescription.para: Returns an invalid wxNullGraphicsBitmap on failure.

briefdescription.para: Creates wxGraphicsBitmap from an existing wxImage.

detaileddescription.para: This method is more efficient than converting wxImage to wxBitmap first and then calling CreateBitmap() but otherwise has the same effect.
Returns an invalid wxNullGraphicsBitmap on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (const wxGraphicsBitmap &bitmap, wxDouble x, wxDouble y, wxDouble w, wxDouble h)=0
memberdef.name: CreateSubBitmap

briefdescription.para: Extracts a sub-bitmap from an existing bitmap.

detaileddescription.para: Currently this function is implemented in the native MSW and OS X versions but not when using Cairo.

briefdescription.para: Creates a native brush from a wxBrush.
Creates a native graphics font from a wxFont and a text colour.

memberdef.argsstring: (double sizeInPixels, const wxString &facename, int flags=wxFONTFLAG_DEFAULT, const wxColour &col= *wxBLACK) const
memberdef.name: CreateFont

briefdescription.para: Creates a font object with the specified attributes.

detaileddescription.para: The use of overload taking wxFont is preferred, see wxGraphicsRenderer::CreateFont() for more details.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble a=1.0, wxDouble b=0.0, wxDouble c=0.0, wxDouble d=1.0, wxDouble tx=0.0, wxDouble ty=0.0) const
memberdef.name: CreateMatrix

briefdescription.para: Creates a native affine transformation matrix from the passed in values.

detaileddescription.para: The default parameters result in an identity matrix.

briefdescription.para: Creates a native affine transformation matrix from the passed generic one.
Creates a native graphics path which is initially empty.
Creates a native pen from a wxPen.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble x, wxDouble y, wxDouble w, wxDouble h)

briefdescription.para: Draws the icon.
Draws a polygon.
Draws the path by first filling and then stroking.

briefdescription.para: Draws a rounded rectangle.
Draws text at the defined position.

briefdescription.para: Draws text at the defined position.

The y coordinate position to draw the text at.
The angle relative to the (default) horizontal direction to draw the string.

Brush to fill the text with.

memberdef.name: DrawText

briefdescription.para: Draws text at the defined position.

parameterdescription.para: The x coordinate position to draw the text at.
The y coordinate position to draw the text at.
The angle relative to the (default) horizontal direction to draw the string.
Brush to fill the text with.

briefdescription.para: Fills the path with the current brush.
Returns the native context (CGContextRef for Core Graphics, Graphics pointer for GDIPlus and cairo_t pointer for cairo).
Fills the widths array with the widths from the beginning of text to the corresponding character of text.

memberdef.argsstring: (const wxString &text, wxDouble *width, wxDouble *height, wxDouble *descent, wxDouble *externalLeading) const =0
memberdef.name: GetTextExtent

briefdescription.para: Gets the dimensions of the string using the currently selected font.

parameterdescription.para: Variable to store the total calculated width of the text.
Variable to store the total calculated height of the text.
Variable to store the dimension from the baseline of the font to the bottom of the descender.
Any extra vertical space added to the font by the font designer (usually is zero).

briefdescription.para: Gets the current transformation matrix of this context.
Resets the clipping to original shape.
Rotates the current transformation matrix (in radians).
Scales the current transformation matrix.
Sets the brush for filling paths.
Sets the brush for filling paths.
Sets the font for drawing text.
Sets the font for drawing text.
Sets the pen used for stroking.
Sets the pen used for stroking.
Sets the current transformation matrix of this context.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxDouble x1, wxDouble y1, wxDouble x2, wxDouble y2)
memberdef.name: StrokeLine

briefdescription.para: Strokes a single line.
Stroke disconnected lines from begin to end points, fastest method available for this purpose.
Stroke lines connecting all the points.

detaileddescription.para: Unlike the other overload of this function, this method draws a single polyline and not a number of disconnected lines.

briefdescription.para: Strokes along a path with the current pen.
Translates the current transformation matrix.
Redirects all rendering is done into a fully transparent temporary context.
Composites back the drawings into the context with the opacity given at the BeginLayer call.
Sets the antialiasing mode, returns true if it supported.
Returns the current shape antialiasing mode.
Sets the interpolation quality, returns true if it is supported.

detaileddescription.para: Not implemented in Cairo backend currently.

Notice that in wxWidgets 3.0 the default interpolation quality for GDI+-based implementation is wxINTERPOLATION_GOOD and not wxINTERPOLATION_DEFAULT (unlike under OS X with CoreGraphics-based implementation). This will be changed in wxWidgets 3.1 and later version, call this method explicitly instead of relying on the default value to ensure consistent behaviour across different platforms and versions.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current interpolation quality.
Sets the compositing operator, returns true if it supported.
Returns the current compositing operator.
Push the current state of the context's transformation matrix on a stack.
Pops a stored state from the stack and sets the current transformation matrix to that state.
Begin a new document (relevant only for printing / pdf etc.) If there is a progress dialog, message will be shown.
Done with that document (relevant only for printing / pdf etc.)
Opens a new page (relevant only for printing / pdf etc.) with the given size in points.

detaileddescription.para: (If both are null the default page size will be used.)

briefdescription.para: Ends the current page (relevant only for printing / pdf etc.)
Make sure that the current content of this context is immediately visible.
Returns the size of the graphics context in device coordinates.
Returns the resolution of the graphics context in device points per inch.
A wxGraphicsContext instance is the object that is drawn upon.

detaileddescription.para: It is created by a renderer using wxGraphicsRenderer::CreateContext(). This can be either directly using a renderer instance, or indirectly using the static convenience Create() functions of wxGraphicsContext that always delegate the task to the default renderer.
